metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23559 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In rndis_query_oid in drivers/net/wireless/rndis_wlan.c in the Linux kernelthrough 6.1.5, there is an integer overflow in an addition.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
